title: 131 — 1 "The First Patient! The Untold Story of the Rumble Ball!"Transliteration: "Hajimete no Kanja! Ranburu Bōru Hiwa" (Japanese:はじめての患者! ランブルボール秘話) Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada November 3, 2002(2002-11-03)[15] —
transformers_text:
131 — 1 "The First Patient! The Untold Story of the Rumble Ball!"Transliteration: "Hajimete no Kanja! Ranburu Bōru Hiwa" (Japanese:はじめての患者! ランブルボール秘話) Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada November 3, 2002(2002-11-03)[15] —

The Straw Hats land on an uninhabited island;Sanjiimmediately notices that it is covered with fruit-bearing trees. The crew decides to divide the work by drawing straws. Luffy,Zoro, andUsoppare sent to gather the fruit whileNamiand Sanji survey the island.Chopperis left to guard the ship. He enjoys himself but suddenly realizes thatRobinis nearby and flees into the cabin. He works on producing Rumble Balls and talks to himself about his mentor, Dr. Kureha, but notices that Robin is listening to him and breaks a barrel of water in surprise. Robin accompanies Chopper as he goes to replace the spilled liquid and he tells Robin about Dr. Kureha and how she became his first patient.
